LanguageData.ReviaExclave.scenario.label: Revian Frontiersmen
LanguageData.ReviaExclave.scenario.description: After one too many arguments with the High Templar of your hometown, you and two of your fellows decide to embark on an adventure. An adventure to establish a Revian exclave where you were free to establish your own rules. Two quadrums of wandering later, and you decide to settle down before your supplies ran out completely.
LanguageData.ReviaExclave.scenario.summary: Three Revian renegades, trying to establish their independence.
